text: The 2016–17 Nemzeti Bajnokság I/B is the 49th season of the Nemzeti Bajnokság I/B, Hungary's second tier Handball league. == Team information == ===Western Group=== The following 14 clubs compete in the NB I/B (Western) during the 2016–17 season: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" !
